extendedInfo.description: Let's play with these cute Color Faces! This is a simple, yet quite polished and funny matching game, hope you like it. Global ranking is also involved. We hope to see your name in the first 10. Have fun!#How to play:  Switch any icon with the one around it. Once three same icons matched, they will disappear and the others will fill the empty sites. Have fun!#Features:-Good Musics &Cute Icons-Global Ranking-With touch screen

reviews.comment: Great game, keeps my 5yrs girl entertained.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t even try it. I can\'t even uninstall it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Laggy. Needs a \"next move\" option for when ur stuck. When no moves left it should tell u game over. If u unselect sound ALL sounds should turn off.
reviews.author: A Google User
